basics.name: Tajae Johnson
basics.label: Full Stack Developer | Software Engineer
basics.summary: As a proficient computer science connoisseur, I possess specialized skills in object-oriented programming and User Interface Development. My foremost priorities when devising and implementing solutions are optimizing efficiency and ensuring security.
basics.objective: I strive to build impactful solutions that advance humanity, within a company that shares my values. I seek an inclusive culture that fosters creativity and offers opportunities for long-term growth and leadership. I aim to architect innovative projects that optimize programming practices and improve the software development lifecycle.

work.name: 2U Inc.
work.summary:
• Delivered in-depth coursework on full-stack development, emphasizing the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js)
  • Instruction on RESTful API development, and integration. 
  • Provided in-depth training on Sequelize ORM for relational databases and Mongoose ORM for NoSQL databases.
  • Guided students through the complexities of Apollo GraphQL API development, including setting up GraphQL schemas, writing queries and mutations, and integrating Apollo Client. 
  • Taught test-driven development (TDD) using frameworks like Jest and Cypress, emphasizing unit, integration, and end-to-end testing for building reliable, scalable applications.
  • Introduced modern DevOps practices such as setting up CI/CD pipelines with CircleCI and GitHub Actions, as well as automating testing and deployment for quality software release cycles.

work.name: ADP Inc.
work.summary:
• Delivered instruction on Java Spring Boot for enterprise-level API development, focusing on Repository CRUD methods, Service layers, Routing, and secure authentication using JWT and Bcrypt.
  • Led lessons on Oracle SQL, covering Stored Procedures, Triggers, Views, and creating auditing mechanisms for data integrity and compliance.
  • Guided students through full-stack development, emphasizing React with Role-Based MVC, and Microservices for scalable, modular applications.
  • Taught the full development lifecycle with Maven and Spring Boot, ensuring production-ready applications with logging and auditing aligned to enterprise standards.
  • Mentored teams in applying Agile methodologies with Jira, promoting collaborative problem-solving through sprint reviews and project audits.
  • Developed critical soft skills like communication, teamwork, and problem-solving, preparing students for professional roles with a focus on accountability and quality assurance in tech-driven environments.

work.name: Freelance Developer
work.summary:
• Developed full-stack applications with Cloudflare SDK and Remix Run, leveraging Cloudflare D1 for database management and Cloudflare KVs for secure session storage.
  • Managed Cloudflare Workers using Wrangler CLI, integrating loaders and actions to deliver modern, dynamic web applications.
  • Conducted API testing using Insomnia and developed robust APIs and microservices with Python FastAPI. Implemented Retrieval Augmented Generation (RaG) leveraging LlamaIndex, Qdrant, and Gemini API to enable advanced, AI-driven functionality for enhanced application performance.
  • Integrated Amazon Textract for extracting  data from documents.

activities.achievements:
• Completed Software Development & Cybersecurity Boot Camps at Univeristy of Texas Austin and UX/UI Boot Camp at University of North Carolina. 
  • GIAC Certifications: GFACT, GSEC. Currently pursuing GCIH
